p: The potential inhibitory activity of the extract was detected against the MRSA. The MIC test result showed that these extracts had inhibitory effects on the MRSA ranging from 125 μg/mL to 1000 μg/mL. Based on the observed results, pet.ether extract of A. indica and ethanol extract of P. guajava showed better inhibitory effects on the MRSA when compared to other extracts.
